short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best way to amplify your savings by getting the best coupon deals and earning real cash back!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spend and receive cashback in crypto with Rewards Bunny. Giving you rewards that multiply like bunnies!



Rewards Bunny is a Chrome extension and mobile app that gives you cash back for your online purchases. Choose to withdraw your cashback in popular cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, BNB, RBunny, or cash. Visit our 1000+ partners, spend what you already are spending and start earning extra cashback benefits today!



Browse our featured partner list or be notified when you shop at our partner's site and start earning cashback for all your online purchases. Rewards Bunny will alert you before you shop or book travel so you never miss out on your rewards. Get extra cashback on top of your debit/credit card programs or even brands loyalty programs!



How Rewards Bunny Works:

Rewards Bunny partners with leading brands and retailers, such as Amazon, eBay, and Hotels.com to name a few. These merchants pay us when you shop at their sites, then we pay you. Share Rewards Bunny with your friends to earn more!



- Download Chrome extension

- Visit your favorite store or discover new partners @ https://app.rewardsbunny.com

- Purchase your items with the Rewards Bunny extension activated

- Sit back and watch your cashback multiply



Love Rewards Bunny?

Your feedback is what keeps us going! Please take a moment to rate our extension.



Missing your favourite store?

Reach us below and we will do our best to connect your favourite store!



Stay in touch for exclusive contests, deals and giveaways!

Website: https://app.rewardsbunny.com

Instagram: www.instagram.com/rewardsbunny

Twitter: www.twitter.com/rewardsbunny

Facebook: www.facebook.com/rewardsbunny

Email: hello@rewardsbunny.com


Affiliate Disclosure:

This extension participates in affiliate programs, which means we may earn a commission if you make a purchase or take specific actions through links provided within the extension. These affiliate partnerships help us maintain and improve the extension, keeping it free for all users.

We prioritize transparency and strive to ensure our users have a clear understanding of how affiliate programs work within the extension. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us through our support channels.
